title: JWT_SECRET environment variable not set in production
expected: User logs in successfully and is redirected to dashboard
actual: Error: JWT_SECRET environment variable is not set in production. Please set JWT_SECRET in Vercel dashboard (Settings > Environment Variables). Generate a secret: openssl rand -base64 32
logs: Error: JWT_SECRET environment variable is not set in production
Stack trace shows error in lib/auth/jwt.ts at generateAccessToken
suggested_fix: Set JWT_SECRET and REFRESH_SECRET environment variables in Vercel Dashboard → Settings → Environment Variables. Generate secrets using: openssl rand -base64 32 (run twice for two different secrets). Redeploy application after setting variables.
